error.signature: Error: accumulating resources: accumulation err='hit retry limit' or 'no matches for kind'
error.regex: accumulating resources|kustomize build.*error|no matches for kind|hit retry limit|unable to find.*kustomization

verdict.summary: Kustomize build fails due to missing resources, invalid patches, or unreachable remote bases.

dead_ends.action: Skip kustomize and apply raw manifests directly
dead_ends.why_fails: Loses all overlays, patches, and environment-specific configuration

dead_ends.action: Pin kustomize version without checking compatibility
dead_ends.why_fails: Different kustomize versions have breaking changes in resource handling

workarounds.action: Run kustomize build with verbose output to identify the exact failing resource
workarounds.how: kustomize build . --enable-alpha-plugins 2>&1 | head -50 — check each listed resource path exists

workarounds.action: Verify all referenced resources, bases, and overlays exist at the correct paths
workarounds.how: Check kustomization.yaml resources: list — ensure each file/directory exists and each remote URL is accessible

leads_to.condition: when kustomize outputs invalid manifests that kubectl can't parse

preceded_by.condition: when migrating from Helm to Kustomize and paths are wrong

frequently_confused_with.distinction: kustomize-build-failed occurs at build/render time before applying, while unable-to-recognize occurs when applying rendered manifests with wrong API versions
